title: B5, LOOKING FOR PLAYERS TO CLIMB THE RANKS
body: drop your usernames! Friendly, can skype if needed or wanted, looking to climb up the ranks again. I am Bronze 5, but that doesn't completely describe me as a player, I will admit I can make some mistakes, but I can make great plays. Prefer Mid, but can play everywhere else pretty well too. So comment your names and ill add you!

replies.body: Jungle main, I play literally anyone you can think of that can jungle. Check my recent match history, I've been told I'm a good ganker but what do I know

Susson3
Hit me up bro.
JG : Rammus, Volibear or Xin Zhao
Top : Kayle, Swain, Volibear, Tahm Kench
Supp : Sona, Soraka, Tahm Kench
Mid : Malzahar, Swain
aha sorry im gold 3 i can't play with you ... best of luck! {{summoner:31}}
what's the point in commenting then...

IGN: Frozen Despair
JG/Support main can play all lanes.
I prefer hard carry jg'ers as I tend to do better with them (Kindred, Shaco etc.). I can also play tanks like Zac and Rek' Sai.
I play mainly Thresh support.
Top: Gnar/Illaoi
Mid: Kassadin/Fizz/Ahri/Veigar
ADC: Lucian

Hit me up.
i can play if u like :)
